item.title: South Korean police consider travel ban for President Yoon amid martial law inquiry
item.description: "We promise the public that we will thoroughly investigate," South Korean senior police officer Woo Jong-soo said on Monday, local time.

item.title: Trump names Alina Habba counselor to the president, with other State Department roles
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump announced several State Department roles in a series of consecutive posts on Truth Social on Sunday.

item.title: 10 hurt after police traffic officer on a motorcycle crashes into parade bystanders
item.description: Authorities say 10 people have been injured after a police traffic officer on a motorcycle crashed into bystanders at a holiday parade in Palm Springs
